title: PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER 2018 LITE
notes: Runs in windowed mode by default. Settings.exe needs .NET 4.5 framework or later to run. Didn't try to install .NET in the proton wine prefix. But if you use another wineprefix or a VM with PES 2018. You can run Settings.exe to enable full screen. Then copy settings.dat to ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/592580/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/KONAMI/PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER 2018 LITE. Low performance.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 550 Series (POLARIS12, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.8-200.fc28.x86_64, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: It opens in a window instead of a full screen on default gnome session (wayland) I'm using flatpak version of steam coming from flathub on fedora 28.
title: PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER 2018 LITE
